title: Handle Serial Number Tracking
description: A wholesaler of high-value electronics must track the unique serial number of each item.

tasks.description: When receiving items, scan the serial number of each individual unit.
tasks.expected_outcome: All serial numbers are recorded in the inventory system upon receipt.

tasks.description: When shipping an order, scan the serial number of each unit being sent to a customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system links specific serial numbers to the customer's sales order.

tasks.description: When a customer has a warranty claim, use the serial number to verify the purchase date and details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent can use the serial number to instantly look up the item's entire history.
